targets.description: Collection names to be exposed as metrics targets, comma-separated, optionally with per-collection alias as prefix, e.g. `coll1,alias1:coll2,coll3` exposes collections `coll1`, `coll2`, `coll3` as `coll1`, `alias1`, `coll3`.

tags.description: Field names to be exposed as tags, comma-seperated with type as suffix, e.g. `field1:string,field2:number`.
